entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
